TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostingEnvironment extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class HostingEnvironment Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class HostingEnvironment sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 在托管应用程序的应用程序域内向托管应用程序提供应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务。

span.span: Provides application-management functions and application services to a managed application within its application domain.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个托管应用程序域都包含类的静态实例 ，该类提供对应用程序管理功能和应用程序服务的访问。Each managed application domain contains a static instance of the class, which provides access to application-management functions and application services. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个网页，其中显示了对象中可用的应用程序信息 。The following code example is a webpage that displays the application information available from the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/CS/hostingEnvironmentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment/VB/hostingEnvironmentvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化 对象。The constructor initializes the object. 仅通过应用程序的对象调用一次构造函数 。The constructor is called only once by the application's object. 多次调用 构造函数将导致 引发异常。Calling the constructor more than once will cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The constructor is called more than once.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DecrementBusyCount() cil managed

summary.span: 将宿主环境中繁忙对象的计数减一。

span.span: Reduces the count of busy objects in the hosted environment by one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当繁忙的已注册对象完成其工作时，它会调用 方法来指示 对象已完成处理，并将繁忙对象的计数减少1。When a busy registered object finishes its work, it calls the method to signal the object that it has completed processing and to reduce the count of busy objects by one. 如果繁忙计数大于零，则即使没有挂起的请求，宿主应用程序也不会超时。If the busy count is greater than zero, the hosting application will not time out even if there are no pending requests. 每次调用方法时，都必须调用 方法 。There must be a call to the method for each call to the method.

summary.span: 允许代码模拟不同的用户。

span.span: Allows code to impersonate a different user.

summary.span: 模拟由指定虚拟路径的配置设置或由指定用户标记所指定的用户。

span.span: Impersonates the user specified by the configuration settings for the specified virtual path, or the specified user token.

span.span: An object that represents the Windows user prior to impersonation; this object can be used to revert to the original user's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法模拟在应用配置设置中影响指定虚拟路径的所有元素后产生的用户。The method impersonates the user that results after applying all elements in the configuration settings affecting the specified virtual path. 如果 `identity` 没有为虚拟路径指定元素，则 方法模拟指定的 Windows 帐户。If an `identity` element is not specified for the virtual path, the method impersonates the specified Windows account.

span.span: The process cannot impersonate.

summary.span: 通过阻止创建租约给予 对象无限的生存期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会重写 其基类中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回 `null` ，并防止创建将限制 对象生存期的租约。It always returns `null` and prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void InitiateShutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 开始关闭与此宿主关联的 Web 应用程序，并从系统中移除注册对象。

span.span: Starts shutting down the web application associated with this host and removes registered objects from the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可停止 web 应用程序域，并删除任何注册到方法的对象 。Use the method to stop a web application domain and remove any objects registered with the method. 此方法会在关闭完成前立即返回。This method returns immediately, before the shutdown is complete. 对 每个已注册的对象调用方法，并将传递的参数设置为，以 `false` 允许每个已注册的对象异步关闭。The method is called on each registered object with the passed parameter set to `false` to allow each registered object to shut down asynchronously. 等待配置元素的属性中指定的时间量后 `shutdownTimeout` ，将 `` 再次调用方法，并将 `true` 为每个已注册的对象保留的传递参数设置为。After waiting for the amount of time specified in the `shutdownTimeout` attribute of the `` configuration element, the method is called again with the passed parameter set to `true` for each registered object remaining. 所有已注册对象关闭后，对象将关闭 应用程序域。Once all registered objects have finished shutting down, the objects shuts down the application domain.

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

summary.span: 因此，这些对象的成员（例如 属性）将不会从调用方流入被调用方。

span.span: Therefore, members of those objects, such as the property, will not flow from the caller to the callee.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Action`1<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Action(Of CancellationToken))

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与正常的 ThreadPool 工作项不同，ASP.NET 可以跟踪通过此 API 注册的工作项的数目当前正在运行，ASP.NET 运行时将尝试延迟 AppDomain 关闭，直到这些工作项执行完毕。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. 不能在 ASP.NET 托管的 AppDomain 外调用此 API。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 当应用程序关闭时，提供的 CancellationToken 将发出信号。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 使用返回任务的回调;当回调返回时，工作项将被视为已完成。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the callback returns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void QueueBackgroundWorkItem(class System.Func`2<valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken, class System.Threading.Tasks.Task> workItem) cil managed
Public Shared Sub QueueBackgroundWorkItem (workItem As Func(Of CancellationToken, Task))
static member QueueBackgroundWorkItem : Func<System.Threading.CancellationToken, System.Threading.Tasks.Task> -> unit

span.span: A unit of execution.

summary.span: 计划可以在后台运行（与任何请求无关）的任务。

span.span: Schedules a task which can run in the background, independent of any request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与正常的 ThreadPool 工作项不同，ASP.NET 可以跟踪通过此 API 注册的工作项的数目当前正在运行，ASP.NET 运行时将尝试延迟 AppDomain 关闭，直到这些工作项执行完毕。Differs from a normal ThreadPool work item in that ASP.NET can keep track of how many work items registered through this API are currently running, and the ASP.NET runtime will try to delay AppDomain shutdown until these work items have finished executing. 不能在 ASP.NET 托管的 AppDomain 外调用此 API。This API cannot be called outside of an ASP.NET-managed AppDomain. 当应用程序关闭时，提供的 CancellationToken 将发出信号。The provided CancellationToken will be signaled when the application is shutting down. 使用返回任务的回调;当返回的任务转换为终端状态时，工作项将被视为已完成。 takes a Task-returning callback; the work item will be considered finished when the returned Task transitions to a terminal state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to register.

summary.span: 将一个对象放在应用程序的已注册对象列表中。

span.span: Places an object in the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许当前应用程序域外的方法创建、管理和销毁当前应用程序域中的对象。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用于向宿主环境注册先前创建的对象。The method is used to register previously created objects with the hosting environment. 用方法注册的对象 必须实现 接口。Objects registered with the method must implement the interface. 若要使用注册的对象，请执行以下步骤：To use a registered object, follow these steps: 1. 通过调用方法，创建已注册对象的新实例 。Create a new instance of your registered object by calling the method. 2. 调用类型特定的方法来初始化新的对象。Call a type-specific method to initialize your new object. 在初始化方法中调用方法， 将对象添加到已注册对象的列表。In the initialization method, call the method to add the object to the list of registered objects. 3. 调用 方法以在需要时返回注册的对象。Call the method to return the registered object when required. 4. 要停止对象时，请调用 方法。When you wish to stop your object, call the method. 方法又调用 方法。The method in turn calls the method. 5. 在 方法中，让你的对象调用 方法。In the method, have your object call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 `Start` 已注册对象的方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of a `Start` method for a registered object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅接口概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: Registers a new instance with the ASP.NET compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将指定的 实例添加到应用程序的虚拟路径提供程序列表中。The method adds the specified instance to the application's list of virtual-path providers. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是使用编译系统注册自定义实例的应用程序启动方法的一部分 。The following code example is part of an application startup method that registers a custom instance with the compilation system. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#11)]

summary.span: 设置当前线程的区域性信息。

span.span: Sets culture information for the current thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures() cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures () As IDisposable

summary.span: 将当前线程的区域性设置为应用程序配置文件中指定的区域性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture specified in the application configuration file.

returns.span: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将当前线程设置为在应用程序的配置文件中[ (ASP.NET Settings Schema) 元素中的全球化元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hy4kkhe0(v=vs.100))中指定的区域性。The method sets the current thread to the culture specified in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hy4kkhe0(v=vs.100)) element in the application's configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IDisposable SetCultures(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public Shared Function SetCultures (virtualPath As String) As IDisposable

param.name: virtualPath

span.span: The path that contains the culture information.

summary.span: 将当前线程的区域性设置为指定虚拟路径的区域性。

span.span: Sets the current thread to the culture of the specified virtual path.

returns.span: 一个表示更改前的区域性的 对象；可使用此对象恢复到先前的区域性。

span.span: An object that represents the culture prior to changing; this object can be used to revert to the previous culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 应用配置文件中影响指定虚拟路径的所有元素后，方法将当前线程设置为所生成的区域性。The method sets the current thread to the culture that results after applying all elements in the configuration files affecting the specified virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event StopListening As EventHandler
Public Shared Event StopListening As EventHandler

summary.span: [仅在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 中受支持]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 only]

summary.span: 当辅助进程或与该主机相关联的应用程序池已停止侦听新的请求，并将最终关闭时才发生。

span.span: Occurs when the worker process or application pool associated with this host has stopped listening for new requests and will eventually shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 IIS 关闭应用程序池及其关联的工作进程时（例如，当应用程序池达到计划的回收时间间隔时），IIS 将通知 ASP.NET 运行时应用程序正在关闭，并且应用程序池的辅助进程将停止侦听新的请求。When an application pool and its associated worker processes are being shut down by IIS, for example when an application pool has reached a scheduled recycle interval, IIS notifies the ASP.NET runtime that the application is shutting down and the worker process for the application pool stops listening for new requests. 如果应用程序使用长时间运行的请求（例如 [SignalR](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432) 应用程序），则可以侦听 事件，并在 IIS 启动应用程序池及其关联的工作进程的关闭时正常关闭其长时间运行的操作。Applications that use long-running requests, for example [SignalR](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=285432) applications, can listen for the event and gracefully shut down their long-running operations when IIS has initiated the shutdown of an application pool and its associated worker processes. > [!WARNING] > 开发人员在实现事件时必须考虑几个设计注意事项 ：There are several design considerations that a developer must consider when implementing the event: > > 1. 此 事件仅适用于配置为使用 IIS 集成管道的应用程序。The event is only available for applications that are configured to use the IIS integrated pipeline. > 2. 开发人员不得从其实现中引发错误 ; 引发错误将产生不可预知的结果。Developers must not throw errors from their implementations; throwing errors will have unpredictable results. > 3. 由于 ASP.NET 中的操作的并发性质，因此，在开发人员实现某个事件后，就不能保证 ASP.NET 会调用 它。Due to the concurrent nature of operations within ASP.NET, there is no guarantee that ASP.NET will call a event once it has been implemented by a developer. > 4. 事件可与其他通知并发执行 。The event can execute concurrently with other notifications. > 5. 开发人员需要注意，ASP.NET 可以在其事件执行时关闭应用程序域 ，并设计其实现来处理这种可能性。Developers need to be aware that ASP.NET may shut down the application domain while their event is executing and design their implementations to handle that possibility. > 6. 事件处理程序不能阻止;阻塞实现将导致死锁，并且在达到快速失败保护时间间隔时，IIS 将终止工作进程。 event handlers must not block; blocking implementations will result in deadlocks, and IIS will terminate the worker process when the rapid fail protection interval is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnregisterObject(class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject obj) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UnregisterObject (obj As IRegisteredObject)

span.span: The object to remove.

summary.span: 从应用程序的已注册对象列表中移除一个对象。

span.span: Removes an object from the list of registered objects for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许当前应用程序域外的方法创建、管理和销毁当前应用程序域中的对象。The class enables methods outside the current application domain to create, manage, and destroy objects inside the current application domain. 方法用于从宿主环境中删除以前注册的对象。The method is used to remove previously registered objects from the hosting environment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 注册对象的方法。The following code example is the method for a registered object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅接口概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the interface overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property VirtualPathProvider As VirtualPathProvider
public: static property System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ VirtualPathProvider { System::Web::Hosting::VirtualPathProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此应用程序的虚拟路径提供程序。

span.span: Gets the virtual path provider for this application.

value.span: 此应用程序的 实例。

span.span: The instance for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当注册多个 实例时， 对象管理调用链。When more than one instance is registered, the object manages the call chain. 你无法控制调用虚拟路径提供程序的顺序。You cannot control the order in which virtual path providers are called.
